original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady; Rupee closes 337/345
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields closed steady on Friday, as dealers said the International Monetary Fund (IMF) executive board is scheduled to review a loan proposal on March 20.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 31.00/30 percent on Friday, down from 31.25/50 percent a day earlier.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 28.15/40 percent, up from 28.10/30 percent a day earlier.
Rupee closed with little activity at 337/345 against the US dollar.
